mapper.update: update discipline set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_discipline_id = #{parentDisciplineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_operator_id = #{updateOperatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, parent_discipline_id, level, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time from discipline where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, description, parent_discipline_id, level, creator_id, creation_time, update_operator_id, update_time from discipline
